The Gaviota Region Interactive Planner allows you to [**visualize the degree of overlap of natural resources**]{.underline}. Values range from 0 to 1, where higher values indicate higher resource availability, which is represented by darker colors on the map.

[**Follow the tour to see what you can do.**]{.underline}
